Combination (Team) Moves
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Combination (Team) Moves
By Infernus on Friday, July 9, 2004 - 03:28 pm:

Finally got around to doing this...well, here is a list of the combination or team moves, the monster needed in the lead, and what they do. It's only a start, so if you can, go here to contribute: Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : For the Team! Discussion of Combination moves!

Lead MonsterMove NameWhat It Does
AntlanBrave SoulHeals monsters. Guts information unknown.
BeaklonTheLastArmAll three monsters attack, then the Beaklon again. Guts information unknown.
DragonVanish FlareTwo side monsters are absorbed by energy pillars and combine with the Dragon, making him larger and stronger, the Dragon then attacks. Guts information unknown.
DuckenHustleBall
DurahanKnight's ValorMonsters turn into energy balls, combine, and hit the boss. Guts information unknown.
GaruFire WishHeals all monsters. Drains all guts.
GitanPlayCauses "Maximize".
GolemGigaLoad
HengerDive
JellEnergizeBoosts guts
JokerSlayerTwo side monsters turn into enrgy balls and combine with the Joker's scythe. Guts information unknown.
RipperTrinityAll three monsters attack, then the Ripper once more. Drains all guts.
SuezoIris BeamCauses "Maximize".
TigerLightning KillAll three monsters attack, then the Tiger again. Guts information unknown.
ZuumLast HeroAll three monsters attack, then the Zuum once more. Drains all guts.
